channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Corner of billbrook road near green lane., 10th February
item.description:
Car is sitting with windscreen wipers up since at least April 2025. It's MOT has now expired and it is causing a nuisance as I can't get a large vehicle to reverse into my rear gate (unloading etc). This has also impacted resident parking on billbrook road for almost a year now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Billbrook Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large deep crater, 10th February
item.description:
Large deep crater on Lansdown Road near junction of Shelburne Road. Please fix, Cheltenham has some shocking roads!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shelburne Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are numerous potholes and missing road surface, 10th February
item.description:
All along the road which is getting worse and is now dangerous as drivers trying to avoid potholes are moving into oncoming traffic. It's only a matter of time before a serious accident happens or cars are damaged due to potholes. The amount of times there has been roadworks due to utilities work, with a bit of forward planning, a coordinated effort could have seen the road fixed long ago before it got into the state it's now. It's starting to look like a warzone
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 10th February
item.description:
NWD 15 MINUTES DELAY BOARDS carriage way pothole 700x600x70mm tarmac parch make safe number 1 (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A very large pothole in Woodlands Road has reappeared between no 9 and 11. Fix in Jan 26 has not worked!!!, 10th February
item.description:
A very large pothole in Woodlands Road between no 9 and no 11. Supposedly fixed in January but it’s all just come undone due to heavy traffic and bus route. Stones flying up into driveways. Potential for damage to parked cars in driveways. Appreciate the road is earmarked for resurface in March but this is dangerous and won’t wait that long

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Woodlands Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pot hole, 10th February
item.description:
In Windyridge Road, Wymans Brook, right by the bus stop near the co-op
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Brook Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot holes and disintegrating road dangerous for cyclists and not good for cars, 10th February
item.description:
Branch Hill Rise Charlton Kings. The road surface is in very poor condition from the edge of Bafford Approach up to 18 Branch Hill Rise on both sides of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Branch Hill Rise, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooded YET AGAIN lmao nice one council., 10th February
item.description:
Still a perpetual problem. Go ahead and tick this green. Won't be long until someone crashes there cos of this mess you cant resolve...

item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Volunteer litter picker, 10th February
item.description:
Hello I am a volunteer litter picker and I notified you on Wednesday 4th February, that I had left 2 bags of recyclable rubbish by bin 0344 just inside the Greenways play area in Barnwood. I have noticed that the bags are still there. I have also added a 3rd recyclable bag today. Please can these be collected sometime.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenways, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Litter picking bags ready for collection

item.title: Loads hole, 10th February
item.description:
Dip is located as you turn into the parking of downfield house flats. Cannot be defined as a "pot hole" As the ground surrounding it on not damaged it a large deep dip on the road which has cause significant damages to the suspension on my vehicle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Harrison Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
